message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I think the product is worth less to me. I'm willing to pay $800,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer is closer to the product's true value.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $900,000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still think the product is worth less to me. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for it.
